018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import java.io.BufferedReader;
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.InputStreamReader;
023import java.net.Socket;
024import java.sql.Connection;
025import java.sql.DriverManager;
026import java.sql.ResultSet;
027import java.sql.SQLException;
028import java.sql.Statement;
029import java.util.ArrayList;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
032import java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch;
033import java.util.logging.Logger;
034
035import org.h2.tools.Server;
036
037import picocli.CommandLine.Command;
038import picocli.CommandLine.Option;
039
040/**
041 * CLI subcommand to start an H2 TCP server for centralized workflow logging.
042 *
043 * <p>This enables multiple actor-IaC processes on the same machine to write to
044 * a single shared log database. The server runs on localhost only - remote
045 * connections are not needed because actor-IaC operates from a single
046 * operation terminal.</p>
047 *
048 * <p><strong>Architecture:</strong></p>
049 * <pre>
050 * [Operation Terminal]
051 * ├── H2 Log Server (localhost:29090)
052 * ├── Workflow Process A ──→ TCP write
053 * ├── Workflow Process B ──→ TCP write
054 * └── Workflow Process C ──→ TCP write
055 *          │
056 *          │ SSH commands
057 *          ▼
058 * [Remote Nodes] ← Don't write directly to log server
059 * </pre>
060 *
061 * <p><strong>Usage:</strong></p>
062 * <pre>{@code
063 * # Start the log server
064 * actor-iac log-server --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs
065 *
066 * # In another terminal, run workflow with --log-server
067 * actor-iac -d ./workflows -w deploy --log-server=localhost:29090
068 * }</pre>
069 *
070 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
071 */
072@Command(
073    name = "log-serve",
074    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
075    version = "actor-IaC log-serve 2.10.0",
076    description = "Serve H2 TCP server for centralized workflow logging."
077)
078public class LogServerCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
079
080    private static final Logger LOG = Logger.getLogger(LogServerCLI.class.getName());
081
082    @Option(
083        names = {"-p", "--port"},
084        description = "TCP port for H2 server (default: ${DEFAULT-VALUE})",
085        defaultValue = "29090"
086    )
087    private int port;
088
089    @Option(
090        names = {"--db"},
091        description = "Database file path without extension (default: ${DEFAULT-VALUE})",
092        defaultValue = "./actor-iac-logs"
093    )
094    private File dbPath;
095
096    @Option(
097        names = {"-v", "--verbose"},
098        description = "Enable verbose output"
099    )
100    private boolean verbose;
101
102    @Option(
103        names = {"--find"},
104        description = "Find running H2 log servers on localhost and show port status"
105    )
106    private boolean find;
107
108    private Server tcpServer;
109
110    /** Ports to scan for H2 servers (actor-IaC reserved range: 29090-29100) */
111    private static final int[] SCAN_PORTS = {29090, 29091, 29092, 29093, 29094, 29095, 29096, 29097, 29098, 29099, 29100};
112    private final CountDownLatch shutdownLatch = new CountDownLatch(1);
113
114    @Override
115    public Integer call() {
116        // Handle --find option
117        if (find) {
118            return findLogServers();
119        }
120
121        try {
122            // Build server arguments (localhost only - no remote connections needed)
123            String[] serverArgs = new String[]{
124                "-tcp",
125                "-tcpPort", String.valueOf(port),
126                "-ifNotExists"
127            };
128
129            // Create and start TCP server
130            tcpServer = Server.createTcpServer(serverArgs);
131            tcpServer.start();
132
133            // Initialize database schema
134            initializeDatabase();
135
136            // Print connection info
137            printConnectionInfo();
138
139            // Register shutdown hook
140            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(this::shutdown, "LogServer-Shutdown"));
141
142            System.out.println("\nServer is running. Press Ctrl+C to stop.");
143
144            // Wait for shutdown signal
145            shutdownLatch.await();
146
147            return 0;
148
149        } catch (SQLException e) {
150            System.err.println("Failed to initialize database: " + e.getMessage());
151            if (verbose) {
152                e.printStackTrace();
153            }
154            return 1;
155        } catch (Exception e) {
156            System.err.println("Failed to start log server: " + e.getMessage());
157            if (verbose) {
158                e.printStackTrace();
159            }
160            return 1;
161        }
162    }
163
164    private void initializeDatabase() throws SQLException {
165        String dbUrl = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + port + "/" + dbPath.getAbsolutePath();
166
167        try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(dbUrl);
168             Statement stmt = conn.createStatement()) {
169
170            // Sessions table
171            stmt.execute("""
172                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sessions (
173                    id IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
174                    started_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
175                    ended_at TIMESTAMP,
176                    workflow_name VARCHAR(255),
177                    overlay_name VARCHAR(255),
178                    inventory_name VARCHAR(255),
179                    node_count INT,
180                    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'RUNNING'
181                )
182                """);
183
184            // Logs table
185            stmt.execute("""
186                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS logs (
187                    id IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
188                    session_id BIGINT,
189                    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
190                    node_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
191                    vertex_name CLOB,
192                    action_name CLOB,
193                    level VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
194                    message CLOB,
195                    exit_code INT,
196                    duration_ms BIGINT,
197                    FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES sessions(id)
198                )
199                """);
200
201            // Node results table
202            stmt.execute("""
203                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS node_results (
204                    id IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
205                    session_id BIGINT,
206                    node_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
207                    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
208                    reason VARCHAR(1000),
209                    FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES sessions(id),
210                    UNIQUE (session_id, node_id)
211                )
212                """);
213
214            // Indexes
215            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_logs_session ON logs(session_id)");
216            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_logs_node ON logs(node_id)");
217            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_logs_level ON logs(level)");
218            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_logs_timestamp ON logs(timestamp)");
219            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sessions_workflow ON sessions(workflow_name)");
220            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sessions_overlay ON sessions(overlay_name)");
221            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sessions_inventory ON sessions(inventory_name)");
222            stmt.execute("CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sessions_started ON sessions(started_at)");
223
224            if (verbose) {
225                System.out.println("Database schema initialized: " + dbPath.getAbsolutePath());
226            }
227        }
228    }
229
230    private void printConnectionInfo() {
231        System.out.println();
232        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
233        System.out.println("H2 Log Server Started");
234        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
235        System.out.println("  TCP Port:  " + port);
236        System.out.println("  Database:  " + dbPath.getAbsolutePath() + ".mv.db");
237        System.out.println();
238        System.out.println("Connect from workflows using:");
239        System.out.println("  --log-server=localhost:" + port);
240        System.out.println();
241        System.out.println("Query logs using:");
242        System.out.println("  actor-iac logs --server=localhost:" + port + " --db " + dbPath.getAbsolutePath() + " --list");
243        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
244    }
245
246    private void shutdown() {
247        System.out.println("\nShutting down H2 server...");
248        if (tcpServer != null) {
249            tcpServer.stop();
250        }
251        shutdownLatch.countDown();
252        System.out.println("Server stopped.");
253    }
254
255    /**
256     * Finds running H2 log servers on localhost.
257     *
258     * @return exit code (0 = success)
259     */
260    private Integer findLogServers() {
261        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
262        System.out.println("Scanning for H2 Log Servers on localhost...");
263        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
264        System.out.println();
265
266        List<ServerInfo> h2Servers = new ArrayList<>();
267        List<ServerInfo> otherServices = new ArrayList<>();
268
269        for (int scanPort : SCAN_PORTS) {
270            ServerInfo info = checkPort(scanPort);
271            if (info != null) {
272                if (info.isH2Server) {
273                    h2Servers.add(info);
274                } else {
275                    otherServices.add(info);
276                }
277            }
278        }
279
280        // Report H2 log servers found
281        if (h2Servers.isEmpty()) {
282            System.out.println("No H2 log servers found.");
283            System.out.println();
284            System.out.println("To start a log server:");
285            System.out.println("  ./actor_iac.java log-server --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs");
286        } else {
287            System.out.println("H2 Log Servers Found:");
288            System.out.println("-".repeat(60));
289            for (ServerInfo info : h2Servers) {
290                System.out.println("  Port " + info.port + ": H2 Database Server");
291                if (info.dbPath != null) {
292                    System.out.println("           Database: " + info.dbPath);
293                }
294                if (info.sessionCount >= 0) {
295                    System.out.println("           Sessions: " + info.sessionCount);
296                }
297                System.out.println("           Connect:  --log-server=localhost:" + info.port);
298                System.out.println();
299            }
300        }
301
302        // Report other services on nearby ports
303        if (!otherServices.isEmpty()) {
304            System.out.println();
305            System.out.println("Other Services on Nearby Ports:");
306            System.out.println("-".repeat(60));
307            for (ServerInfo info : otherServices) {
308                System.out.println("  Port " + info.port + ": " + info.serviceName);
309                if (info.processInfo != null) {
310                    System.out.println("           Process: " + info.processInfo);
311                }
312            }
313        }
314
315        // Suggest available port
316        int availablePort = findAvailablePort();
317        if (availablePort > 0 && h2Servers.isEmpty()) {
318            System.out.println();
319            System.out.println("All ports in range 29090-29100 are available.");
320            System.out.println("Start a log server with:");
321            System.out.println("  ./actor_iac.java log-server --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs");
322        } else if (availablePort > 0) {
323            System.out.println();
324            System.out.println("Next available port: " + availablePort);
325            System.out.println("  ./actor_iac.java log-server --port " + availablePort + " --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs");
326        }
327
328        System.out.println();
329        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
330
331        return 0;
332    }
333
334    /**
335     * Checks what's running on a port.
336     */
337    private ServerInfo checkPort(int checkPort) {
338        // First, check if port is open
339        try (Socket socket = new Socket("localhost", checkPort)) {
340            socket.setSoTimeout(1000);
341            // Port is open, try to identify the service
342        } catch (Exception e) {
343            // Port not open
344            return null;
345        }
346
347        ServerInfo info = new ServerInfo(checkPort);
348
349        // Try to connect as H2
350        try {
351            // Try to connect to H2 and query session count
352            String url = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + checkPort + "/~/.h2/test;IFEXISTS=TRUE";
353            try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url)) {
354                info.isH2Server = true;
355                // This DB might not have our schema, but we know it's H2
356            }
357        } catch (SQLException e) {
358            // Check if it's "Database not found" - that still means H2 server is running
359            String msg = e.getMessage();
360            if (msg != null && (msg.contains("Database") || msg.contains("not found") ||
361                    msg.contains("Connection is broken") || msg.contains("90067"))) {
362                info.isH2Server = true;
363            }
364        }
365
366        if (info.isH2Server) {
367            // Try to get info from actor-iac-logs database
368            tryGetLogServerInfo(info);
369        } else {
370            // Try to identify other services using lsof
371            info.serviceName = identifyService(checkPort);
372        }
373
374        return info;
375    }
376
377    /**
378     * Tries to get information about a log server's database.
379     */
380    private void tryGetLogServerInfo(ServerInfo info) {
381        // Try common database paths
382        String[] commonPaths = {
383            "./actor-iac-logs",
384            "./logs/actor-iac-logs",
385            System.getProperty("user.home") + "/actor-iac-logs"
386        };
387
388        for (String path : commonPaths) {
389            try {
390                String url = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + info.port + "/" + path;
391                try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url);
392                     Statement stmt = conn.createStatement();
393                     ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions")) {
394                    if (rs.next()) {
395                        info.sessionCount = rs.getInt(1);
396                        info.dbPath = path;
397                        return;
398                    }
399                }
400            } catch (SQLException e) {
401                // This path doesn't have our schema, try next
402            }
403        }
404    }
405
406    /**
407     * Identifies a service using lsof.
408     */
409    private String identifyService(int checkPort) {
410        try {
411            ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder("lsof", "-i", ":" + checkPort, "-sTCP:LISTEN");
412            pb.redirectErrorStream(true);
413            Process process = pb.start();
414
415            try (BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(process.getInputStream()))) {
416                String line;
417                while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
418                    if (!line.startsWith("COMMAND")) {
419                        String[] parts = line.split("\\s+");
420                        if (parts.length > 0) {
421                            return parts[0]; // Process name
422                        }
423                    }
424                }
425            }
426            process.waitFor();
427        } catch (Exception e) {
428            // lsof not available or failed
429        }
430
431        return "Unknown service";
432    }
433
434    /**
435     * Finds an available port.
436     */
437    private int findAvailablePort() {
438        for (int scanPort : SCAN_PORTS) {
439            try (Socket socket = new Socket("localhost", scanPort)) {
440                // Port is in use
441            } catch (Exception e) {
442                // Port is available
443                return scanPort;
444            }
445        }
446        return -1;
447    }
448
449    /**
450     * Information about a service running on a port.
451     */
452    private static class ServerInfo {
453        final int port;
454        boolean isH2Server = false;
455        String dbPath = null;
456        int sessionCount = -1;
457        String serviceName = null;
458        String processInfo = null;
459
460        ServerInfo(int port) {
461            this.port = port;
462        }
463    }
464}
